thread.section_title: DIY Awards Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DIY Awards | diyawards.com
thread.title: Shondolyn

author: Shondolyn
title: Shondolyn
text: I had never heard of DIY Awards. I looked online for retirement gifts and ran across this company. I did a little research and trusted my gut to go with the Globe Sail Award. Upper management loved the gift and so did the recipient, who was very surprised. The cost was comparable to other awards, and the turn around time was excellent, in the crunch. I am more than pleased with my purchase and will be sure to order from your company again in the future.
